Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: we have made changes to your medications, we have stopped lasix and allopurinol.
Please discuss with your PCP regarding starting Colchicine 0.6mg PO BID for maintenance of CPPD remission.

Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - Specialist appointment

Jargon Term: Please come back to the Emergency Room if you have fever, chills, joint pain, shortness of breath, markedly altered mental status, or chest pain.
